verbs.description: as [ARG1: births] [V: decline] [ARGM-LOC: in young women] they keep rising in 40-somethings here why the u s is in the midst of a baby bust as birthrates fall in every age group of women except for one women in their 40s according to new statistics while most babies are born to women in their 20s and 30s the continued rise of older moms reflects a long - term shift to delayed childbearing centers for disease control and prevention feinberg school of medicine 40 somethings younger age andrea mechanick braverman pew research center karla webber eve feinberg dunwoody georgia grayson christos coutifaris
